wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Wilson Arnold (born 1 May 1928) is a Scottish former footballer who played as a defender. Arnold began his senior career in the early 1950s with Dundee United, having previously played with Dundonald Bluebell. Featuring in over 100 league matches for The Terrors, Arnold went on to play for Stirling Albion and Berwick Rangers after leaving Tannadice. It is unknown where his career headed after Berwick.
